articles.title: If The S&P Tops Out This Week, It May Not Matter - Here's Why
articles.content: The S&P 500's recent rally is driven by relief over no new tariffs. Read why investors should focus on 493 S&P 500 stocks outside the Magnificent 7.

articles.title: Wall Street Brunch: Sparks Could Fly At Fed Presser
articles.content: Expect questions about Fed independence at the chairman's Q&A. Apple, Microsoft, Met and Tesla report results. Alphabet may be sitting on an Nvidia rival.

articles.title: S&P 500 Earnings This Week: FOMC Decision, Mega-Cap Tech Earnings, And December PCE On Friday
articles.content: Tesla, Meta and Microsoft report after the closing bell on Jan. 29; Apple, Intel and Visa report on Jan. 30. December PCE and Core PCE are due on Jan. 31; consensus expects +0.2% Core PCE.

articles.content: U.S. equity indices generated modest returns in the fourth quarter of 2024, and closed out the full year with double digit returns for the second year in a row.
